titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of August 9, 1955, to provide for binding arbitration for Gila River Indian Community Reservation Contracts.
A bill to amend the Act of August 9, 1955, to provide for binding arbitration for Gila River Indian Community Reservation Contracts.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Amends federal Indian law to provide for binding arbitration for Gila River Indian Community Reservation contracts (including leases, as currently covered by such law).
